citation: Proclamation under the Local Government (Highways) Amendment Act 2001 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Local Government (Highways) Amendment Act 2001

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2(1) of the Local Government (Highways) Amendment Act 2001 fix 1 June 2002 as the day on which sections 5 , 6 , 9 , 10 , 11 , 14 and 16 of that Act commence.

6 May 2002

G. S. M. Green

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. A. Bacon

Premier

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 15 May 2002

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
